title: New Distinct Substrings
text:
Given a string, we need to find the total number of its distinct substrings.InputT- number of test cases. T ≤ 20;
Each test case consists of one string, whose length is ≤ 50000OutputFor each test case output one number saying the number of distinct substrings.ExampleInput:2
CCCCC
ABABAOutput:5
9
